__e: Rooms and terraces from 50 to 250 people for receptions

Belvedere Bar is located above the Burger. It is next to the children area, Kid's Lagoon. There are two terraces, from one you can enjoy a view of the whole park and from the other you will see the Roses Bay.

Nice villa: living room, dining room, kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 shower, 1 master bedroom with bathroom. Terraces with wonderful panoramic sea-view, swimming pool. 2 parkings, 1 garage. Elevator, staff apartment.

Nice villa: living room, dining room, kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 shower, 1 master bedroom with bathroom. Terraces with wonderful panoramic sea-view, swimming pool. 2 parkings, 1 garage. Elevator, staff apartment.
It is a clean and decorative product, without fumes, ideal for gardens, terraces and events.
Have a look around. See the village square, the house itself, all of its rooms, the terraces and the garden just as if you were locally there.
Terraces and rooms with bath, toilet, shower, TV.
